rank.description: Spread ranking based on the selected metric.

stats.description: Attack, Defense and Stamina, as calculated in-game.

statProduct.description: Standard metric used to rank spreads - calculated by multiplying the generated Attack, Defense and Stamina values together.

bulkProduct.description: Alternative metric to rank spreads - calculated by multiplying the generated Defense and Stamina values together.

percent.description: Percentage of the top ranked spread.

showSpeculative.description: Unreleased Generations, Forms and Mega Evolutions. For some speculative Pokémon this will include multiple variations with different stat nerfs based on similar cases in the past.

showRankingMetric.description: Options to sort by Attack, Defense and Stamina as well as the default Stat Product.

showMinimumLevel.description: Choose the minimum level to use when creating a Candidate. Useful for checking ranks when species are not available at certain lower levels.

allowImpossibleFloors.description: Allow any IV floor to be picked when creating a Candidate, regardless of acquisition method limitations.

invertIVDropdown.description: List IV options from 15-0 (descending) instead of 0-15 (ascending).

ranking-metrics.title: Ranking Metric
ranking-metrics.description: Select the metric to rank the spreads by.

product.description: Standard metric used to rank spreads - calculated by multiplying the generated Attack, Defense and Stamina values together.

bulkProduct.description: Alternative metric to rank spreads - calculated by multiplying the generated Defense and Stamina values together.

minimum-level.title: Minimum Level
minimum-level.description: Choose the minimum level to compare.
